DataElement.preferredDefinition: The start date of the adverse event represented in an unambiguous date format (e.g., DD-MON-YYYY).

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record the start date of the AE using this format (DD-MON-YYYY).

ReferenceDocuments.name: AESTDTC
ReferenceDocuments.description: This does not map directly to an SDTMIG variable. For the SDTM submission dataset, concatenate all collected CDASH START DATE and TIME components and populate the SDTMIG variable AESTDTC in ISO 8601 format.

ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is to be used for CDISC aligned data collection in place of CDE 2744993 from the original NCI Standard CRF Template.
